title: How to Make Peanut Butter Star Cookies

steps.headline: Begin mixing in medium size bowl,1 tsp.
steps.description: baking soda, 1 3/4 cups flour and 1/2 tsp. salt.

steps.headline: Cream together in same bowl, 1/2 cup butter and 1/2 cup peanut butter.
Gradually Add:(to same bowl) 1/2 cup of sugar, 1/2 cup firmly packed brown sugar, 1 unbeaten egg, 1 tsp.
Beat while blending in dry ingredients.
Take ingredients in bowl and shape into balls.
steps.description: (about the size of a 50 cent piece)

steps.headline: Spray the baking pan with cooking spray.
steps.description: Place sugar rolled balls onto baking pan. (Make sure cookies are about an inch apart from each other on your desired baking pan)

steps.headline: Add chocolate stars to the top of each cookie immediately after taking them out of the oven.
Let cookies cool for 5 minutes before eating.

text: Begin mixing in medium size bowl,1 tsp. baking soda, 1 3/4 cups flour and 1/2 tsp. salt. Cream together in same bowl, 1/2 cup butter and 1/2 cup peanut butter.  Gradually Add:(to same bowl) 1/2 cup of sugar, 1/2 cup firmly packed brown sugar, 1 unbeaten egg, 1 tsp. vanilla, 2 tbs. milk. Beat while blending in dry ingredients.  Take ingredients in bowl and shape into balls. (about the size of a 50 cent piece) Roll balls into sugar.  Spray the baking pan with cooking spray. Place sugar rolled balls onto baking pan. (Make sure cookies are about an inch apart from each other on your desired baking pan) Bake at 375*F for 8 minutes  Add chocolate stars to the top of each cookie immediately after taking them out of the oven.  Let cookies cool for 5 minutes before eating.  Finished.
